description: This file defines a React functional component named Navbar which provides the top navigation bar for the frontend of a recipe web application. It includes search functionality, routing links, and authentication controls.

methods.name: Navbar({ isAuthenticated, onLogout, onSearch })
methods.description: React functional component providing navigation bar with search and auth controls.

methods.name: submitSearch
methods.description: Handles the search form submission, triggers search callback, and updates URL.

ctags.name: Navbar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Navbar({ isAuthenticated, onLogout, onSearch }) {$/
